welcome.clientlist.title: Who is using Gitpay
welcome.consulting.item.primary: We help you to use agile processes and push your company forward
welcome.consulting.item.secondary: You create demmands for your business and we make this happen using agile tools
welcome.consulting.item.two.secondary: Our platform is made by passionate developers and we wish to expand our agile processes to other roles with the powers of Git to help with content management
welcome.consulting.item.three.primary: We work with deliveries on the cloud
welcome.consulting.item.three.secondary: We support infrastructures using very known services like Amazon, Heroku and Google Cloud â€” all we need is your project connected with Git
welcome.how.item.primary: Once subscribed you will receive an e-mail to let you know when new tasks are available
welcome.how.item.secondary: Clients who create demands are looking for contributors with different skills
welcome.how.item.two.primary: You are now assigned and will receive all the instructions needed to start
welcome.how.item.two.secondary: You get access to all info you need to start and discuss possible solutions
welcome.how.item.three.primary: We validate your change, integrate the code and you receive a bounty
welcome.how.item.three.secondary: Once you finish editing, your solution will be reviewed and integrated on the codebase for you to receive a bounty
welcome.how.title: How it works
welcome.how.people.title: How it works
welcome.main.item.one.primary: Work in projects using the best development tools
welcome.main.item.one.secondary: We use all the Git tools and version control to manage deliveries for our clients
welcome.main.item.two.primary: Colaboration with companies by tasks on demand
welcome.main.item.two.secondary: Work in different projects, colaborate and learn with stacks
welcome.main.item.three.secondary: Receive bounties for the task you concluded with direct payment when your code is merged on the codebase
welcome.companies.item.one.primary: Manage the tasks of your projects
welcome.companies.item.one.secondary: With our platform the companies are able to manage your tasks on demand with development tools that suits your needs
welcome.companies.item.two.secondary: Companies will be able to use Open Source to create colaborative tools that will help other companies and contribute with the OSS ecosystem
welcome.companies.item.three.primary: We validate your business integration process
welcome.companies.item.three.secondary: We help your business to fit in agile process, having your tasks concluded in an independent way and according to your business
welcome.howto.item.one.primary: A new task is now created
welcome.howto.item.one.secondary: A new issue, demand, enhancement or suggestion is created on the platform, that represents needs like development, SEO, content, infrastructure or even new ideas
welcome.howto.item.two.primary: Your demand was sent to our community
welcome.howto.item.two.secondary: Differents colaborators group will be interested to solve this issue for the price invested for that bounty
welcome.howto.item.three.primary: Sent a pull request to receive a bounty
welcome.howto.item.three.secondary: A Pull Request is in the repo and once approved the bounty is sent
welcome.howto.item.four.primary: Agile process between business, payment, consulting and development
welcome.howto.item.four.secondary: We want to make transactions and payment between colaborators and companies easier, so we developed smart tools and consolidated process used in agile companies and emerging startups
welcome.tagline.companies.main.headline: For companies
welcome.tagline.headline.how.title: How it works
welcome.companies.item.secondary: Distributed colaboration helps company grows and provide a great solution to have the tasks solved using agile process and colaboration throught development
welcome.companies.title: For companies
welcome.who.item.secondary: Clients, team leads, designers, content creators and managers, everyone can follow the progress and status using tools to manage their projects for remote teams
welcome.who.item.two.secondary: Beginners will learn how contribute to real companies with real projects, experienced contributors can help with revisions and hard tasks, and is possible to choose projects and tasks that you want to grow or that you are familiar and confortable to work with
welcome.who.item.three.primary: Learn by doing and receive bounties
welcome.who.item.three.secondary: Work in different projects and create solutions with distributed teams around the world, using tools that you are familiar to and propose solutions for issues that you know. You will be able to be assigned for new challenges
welcome.workflow.item.secondary: Clients, team leads, designers, content creators and managers, everyone can follow the progress and status using already known tools to manage their projects for remote teams
welcome.workflow.item.two.secondary: Beginners will learn how contribute to real companies with real projects, experienced contributors can help with revisions and hard tasks, and is possible to choose projects and tasks that you want to grow or that you are familiar and confortable to work with
welcome.workflow.item.three.primary: Learn by doing and receive bounties
welcome.workflow.item.three.secondary: Work in different projects and create solutions with distributed teams around the world, using tools that you are familiar and propose solutions for issues that you know. You will be able to be assigned for new challenges
welcome.collab.item.one.primary: Work with collaboration between members, maintainers and clients
welcome.collab.item.one.secondary: Working with collaboration, you can help and support from a community
welcome.collab.item.two.primary: Work with smart integrations and tools
welcome.collab.item.two.secondary: Focus on the task instead of worry about how you will deliver, using git tools and integration the delivery is more efficient
welcome.collab.item.three.secondary: The open source allow us to work in descentralized and independent projects and we follow this path to provide our deliveries
welcome.pricing.title: Princing
welcome.pricing.description: Check our options to boost your company deliveries that can fit with your needs
welcome.integration.title: Integration
welcome.integration.subtitle: Check out our Github app
welcome.integration.desc: You can install our Gitpay app on your Github and start to boost your issues
welcome.bottom.call: A better way to build your project, a better way to work in projects
